issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.3rc16

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.anothersadtrombone.com/`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

comment.body:
It still works most of the time on my end.
But if I'm not wrong, it looks like that sometimes main source of the video is set to advertisement, this rule should works:
```adblock
||video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/*/*_Dt14.m3u8
```
or (rule below may cause breakage on other websites):
```adblock
||video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/*/*.m3u8
```

### Prerequisites

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

Other ad blocker

-

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Some links in the `Availability` section have tracking parameters:
`https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Grand_Theft_Auto_V#Availability`

```adb
! https://epicgames.com/p/grand-theft-auto-v?epic_affiliate=pcgamingwiki

||epicgames.com^$removeparam=epic_affiliate
||gamersgate.com^$removeparam=caff
||humblebundle.com^$removeparam=partner
```

The list already contains some filters for `humblebundle.com`.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~60 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This has periodically been reported but I haven't ever reproduced.
> Please notify me on this page if you need any additional information.

Disable Stealth mode and filter lists other than ours, check if the problem persists. If possible, narrow down the cause by enabling/disabling each feature or lists one by one.

> I also hope your VPN team will put a little more effort into developing its stealth feature to avoid detection.

I think you misunderstand. Most websites detect VPN only based on IP-matching with popular database such as `proxycheck.io` so what we can do is at best adding servers with a little hope some of them are not in those database. Stealth feature some VPN provider advertise is more of a marketing gimmick, in fact, you can use TLS/SSH-tunnel with any provider supporting OpenVPN and/or Wireguard, though AdGuard VPN is an exception as it uses own protocol.

According to screenshot these are Outbrain ads, but rule `||widgets.outbrain.com/outbrain.js` is blocking it on the page (included in Base filter).

Also you mention desktop page, but when I visit the site with Android, I get redirected to mobile page.

https://m.spox.com/de/sport/fussball/international/spanien/2306/Artikel/real-madrid-mit-randal-kolo-muani-eintracht-frankfurt-in-kontakt-sge.html?deviceRedirect=1

Likely you meant 13 and not 33 (latter is not out yet).

@zloyden please check.

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://abema.tv/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fabema.tv%2F) ### Comment > @Yuki2718 > この問題を担当してくださりありがとうございます。 > 日本の方のようなので日本語で失礼します。 > > ・不具合について > 詳しく調べたところ、どうやらステルスモードの「サードパーティのAuthorizationヘッダをブロックする (Block third-party Authorization header)」 > が原因であることが分かりました(この機能をオフにするとサイトは正常に表示されます)。 > ログで関係がありそうなものとして、スクリーンショット記載の項目を見つけました(逆にこれ以外には見つかりませんでした)。 > 再度調べていただき、ステルスモードのこの機能をオンにしていてもアクセスできるよう(それでいてステルス性能をなるべく損なわないよう)修正してもらえないでしょうか。 > > ・VPNについて > "stealth feature"という用語がミスリーディングだったかもしれませんが、 > 私は別に誤解しているわけではありません。 > 業者の多くがIPアドレスをベースにしたブロッキングを行っていることも知っています。 > しかし「IPアドレスをブロックされてるからアクセスできない」というところで > 止まっていたら進歩はないのではないでしょうか。 > そういう大きな困難を乗り越えるのが技術者の方々のつとめだと思います(もちろん一朝一夕には無理でしょうが)。 ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Sadly I still cannot reproduce :(

Please press in filtering log on 3p, then on regular. Now click on the first result which has `Stealth Mode enabled` in column filter, press on Block.
Now it should display something like this:

`||res-1.cdn.office.net/shellux/api/shellbootstrapper/consumer/oneshell$domain=account.microsoft.com`

Now add `@@` at the front and `,stealth` at the end. Now try again. If not working, proceed with the next entry which has the Stealth Mode enabled.
